name: Moon & Star Pendant Necklace
description:
Add a touch of elegance and celestial charm to your outfit with this minimal yet classy necklace.
• Design: Stylish moon & star drop pendant
• Material: Lightweight & skin-friendly
• Occasion: Perfect for daily wear, parties, or gifting

name: Pink Heart Drop Earrings
description:
Add a touch of romance to your look with these elegant pink crystal heart earrings. Designed with a golden hook and lightweight charm, they’re perfect for everyday wear or special occasions.
• Design: Faceted pink heart crystal with golden hook.
• Style: Cute, classy & versatile.
• Comfort: Lightweight & easy to wear.

name: Red Beaded Adjustable Bracelet
description:
Elevate your style with this elegant red beaded bracelet, designed with glossy round beads and delicate golden accents. Its adjustable chain ensures a perfect fit for all wrist sizes, making it both stylish and comfortable.
• Design: Glossy red beads with golden detailing.
• Fit: Adjustable chain for all wrist sizes.
• Style: Perfect for daily wear, parties, or gifting.
• Comfort: Lightweight and skin-friendly.
